title: Blueprint, "Anne Wrigley Yacht: Stateroom", October 13, 1934
markings: Stamp in lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in stamp at lower right: Job 524/ 3/4"=1'0"/Olsson/ 10/13/34, 10/20/34, 1, Office (?); inscribed at lower center: YACHT - STATEROOM/DECORATOR ANNE WRIGLEY/SCALE 3/4" - 1'0; instructions in graphite
description: Plan and elevations for state room of Anne Wrigley's yacht. Entrance to room on south wall near left. Bed in corner, lower right. Another bed placed in opposite corner, upper right; night stand between beds with reflector behind; light behind each bed. Vanity in upper left corner with rounded front right edge; cabinet at left, three stacked drawers at right. Circular vanity stool on tubular pedestal in front of vanity. Door to bathroom in center of west wall. Built-in closet to left of bathroom door.
